cc.char_indexingtool

Class ObjMovableTypeBasicSettingTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.char_indexingtool.ObjMovableTypeBasicSettingTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChineseCharacterTypeSetter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FontRefSettingTool, SimplePieceSetter

    public abstract class ObjMovableTypeBasicSettingTool
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChineseCharacterTypeSetter
    這是予物件活字設定工具一个共用的型態。用一層較懸頂的收集逐家攏愛用到的物件。
